name: In re REAPPORTIONMENT OF SCHOOL DISTRICT OF the CITY OF PITTSBURGH. SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PITTSBURGH, Appellant v. Theodore A. VAN WORMER
docket_number: Appeals Nos. 1 and 4, W.D. Appeal Dkt. 1985

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: In re REAPPORTIONMENT OF SCHOOL DISTRICT OF the CITY OF PITTSBURGH. SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PITTSBURGH, Appellant v. Theodore A. VAN WORMER.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Orders affirmed.
JUDGMENT
ON CONSIDERATION WHEREOF, it is now here ordered and adjudged by this Court that the judgments of the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF ALLEGHENY COUNTY, be, and the same are, hereby affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert J. Stefanko, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
William A. Penrod, Pittsburgh, for Van Wormer.
Allan J. Opsitnick, Ira Weiss, Office of County Sol., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
486 A.2d 1328
In re REAPPORTIONMENT OF SCHOOL DISTRICT OF the CITY OF PITTSBURGH. SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PITTSBURGH, Appellant v. Theodore A. VAN WORMER.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 24, 1985.
Decided Feb. 7, 1985.
Robert J. Stefanko, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
William A. Penrod, Pittsburgh, for Van Wormer.
Allan J. Opsitnick, Ira Weiss, Office of County Sol., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
